testcase.classname: Registration with new account to elearning application
testcase.name: Signup with new Email id
testcase.system-out: Given User opens URL in a browser to open Application.......................passed Given User clicks on SignUp Link............................................passed Then User validates that Registration page should be opened.................passed Given User enters first Name as "Mayur".....................................passed And User enters last Name as "Varshney".....................................passed And User enters unique EmailId..............................................passed And User enters unique Username.............................................passed And User enters valid password and confirm Password.........................passed And User enters Phone number as "9876543210"................................passed And User enter code.........................................................passed And User clicks on Register button..........................................passed Then verify Registration should be completed Successfully...................passed When User Clicks on top right corner to open drop-down......................passed Then User Validates the email which is entered..............................passed When User click on Inbox....................................................passed And user click on Compose Message Button....................................passed And user enters email of recipient..........................................passed And user enters subject as "Hi For Testing".................................passed And User enters message body................................................passed And user clicks on Send message button......................................passed Then user verify the email acknowlegement...................................passed
